name: Speed's Map of Lancashire (1610)
description: John Speed's iconic county map of Lancashire from 'The Theatre of the Empire of Great Britaine'. Includes town plan inset of Lancaster. Shows Manchester.
notes:
From 'The Theatre of the Empire of Great Britaine' (1611-12).
John Speed (1552-1629). Engraved by Jodocus Hondius.
Includes decorative cartouche, coat of arms, and inset town plan of Lancaster.
Manchester shown as significant settlement.
NLS has digitized versions. Also widely available on Wikimedia Commons.
